Title: Relates to doula access during emergency situations
Summary: Provides that maternal health care facilities are not required to grant doula access during emergencies or when such access could compromise the safety of the patient or health care team.
LawCode: Amd ยง2500-m, Pub Health L (as proposed in S.5992-A & A.6168-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to doula access during emergency situations
